'''Fish and Chips''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be bought from [[Louis]] in the [[Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage|Vasari Passage]] of the [[Court of Fontaine]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Fish and Chips restores '''70'''/'''85'''/'''100''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Charlotte|Exclusive Scoop: Gourmet Column}}
